items.sentence: This nation's economy has been growing at a rapid pace in recent years.
Tom wanted me to go to Boston with him, but I told him that I couldn't.
Tom wanted me to go to Boston with him, but I told him that I wouldn't.
Tom had a lot of suggestions. However, not many of them were good ones.
The man I talked to on the bus said he'd been to Australia three times.
I can't speak French fluently yet, but I can understand it fairly well.
I sewed a button back on a shirt for the first time just the other day.
Tom knew he barely had enough money to buy everything he wanted to buy.
On Monday, Tom made it plain he wasn't yet ready to throw in the towel.
I didn't sleep well the night before last, but I slept well last night.
